content: Select the {{organizationName}} Workspace backup file to start the data import. Once the data upload and analysis are complete, the next step will be initiated automatically.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a description for a user interface element that prompts users to select an OnlyOffice Workspace backup file. The description appears in a UI dialog and explains the next step in the data import process after successful upload and analysis.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes a space before the curly braces `{{organizationName}}`. While not strictly incorrect, it's best to remove the space for consistency and clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: حدد ملف النسخ الاحتياطي مساحة عمل{{organizationName}} لبدء استيراد البيانات.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'входирането' is not the standard or most accurate translation of 'import' in this context. It sounds awkward and uncommon.  A better translation for 'import' would be 'внос'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изберете архивния файл на {{organizationName}} Workspace, за да започнете вноса на данни.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'spusťte import dat' (start data import) is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'importujte data' (import data).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vyberte soubor zálohy pracovního prostoru {{organizationName}} a importujte data. Po dokončení nahrávání a analýzy dat se automaticky spustí další krok.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech sentence is a bit long and could be split for better readability. While grammatically correct, shorter sentences often read better in UI text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vyberte soubor zálohy pracovního prostoru {{organizationName}}. Importujte data. Po dokončení nahrávání a analýzy dat se automaticky spustí další krok.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to start the data import' is translated as 'aloittaaksesi tietojen siirto'. While technically correct, 'tietojen tuonti' would be a more natural and common phrasing for 'data import' in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Valitse {{organizationName}} Workspace-varmuuskopiotiedosto aloittaaksesi tietojen tuonnin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content specifies that only one file can be selected. This information is missing from the Finnish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Valitse {{organizationName}} Workspace-varmuuskopiotiedosto aloittaaksesi tietojen tuonnin. Vain yksi tiedosto voidaan valita. Seuraava vaihe aloitetaan automaattisesti, kun tietojen lataus ja analysointi on tehty.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'lancé' should agree with the subject 'étape' (step). It needs to be 'lancée'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sélectionnez les fichier de sauvegarde d'{{organizationName}} Workspace pour lancer l'importation. Une fois le téléchargement et l'analyse de données terminés, l'étape suivante est lancée automatiquement.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fichier' is misspelled. It should be 'fichiers'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sélectionnez les fichiers de sauvegarde d'{{organizationName}} Workspace pour lancer l'importation. Une fois le téléchargement et l'analyse de données terminés, l'étape suivante est lancée automatiquement.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'պահեստային' (pahves tayin) could be slightly ambiguous. While it generally means 'backup', it might be more precise to use a term that specifically denotes a workspace backup file, if one exists in Armenian. Consider 'աշխատասեղանի պաշտպանության ֆայլ' (ashxataselani pashtpanut'yan fayl) for 'workspace protection file', but this depends on context and established terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Investigate if a more specific Armenian term exists for 'Workspace backup file'. If not, 'պահեստային' is acceptable, but note the possible ambiguity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໄຟລ໌' (file) is repeated unnecessarily. It should appear only once.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເລືອກໄຟລ໌ສຳຮອງພື້ນທີ່ເຮັດວຽກ {{organizationName}} ເພື່ອເລີ່ມການນໍາເຂົ້າຂໍ້ມູນ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ເມື່ອການອັບໂຫລດຂໍ້ມູນ ແລະການວິເຄາະສຳເລັດແລ້ວ' could be more fluent.  'ເມື່ອການອັບໂຫລດຂໍ້ມູນ ແລະການວິເຄາະສຳເລັດ' is more concise and natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເມື່ອການອັບໂຫລດຂໍ້ມູນ ແລະການວິເຄາະສຳເລັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a comma (,) instead of a colon (:) after 'Workspace'. While a comma is sometimes used in Polish for similar constructions, a colon is more grammatically precise and improves readability in this context, reflecting the English structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wybierz plik kopii zapasowej {{organizationName}} Workspace: aby rozpocząć import danych.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'fișierele de rezervă' is grammatically correct but slightly awkward. It translates to 'backup files'. It would be more natural to use a single file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selectați fișierul de rezervă {{organizationName}} Workspace pentru a demara importul de date.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඉලඟ' (ilanga) is archaic and less common. A more natural and modern alternative would be 'ඊළඟ' (eelaga).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ඉලඟ' with 'ඊළඟ'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'spustite import údajov' (start the data import) is slightly awkward. A more natural Slovak phrasing would be 'začnite import údajov' or 'začnite s importom údajov'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vyberte záložný súbor služby {{organizationName}} Workspace a začnite import údajov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses 'služby' which might be a little formal for this context. While not incorrect, it could be softened to 'pre' or removed depending on the tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vyberte záložný súbor {{organizationName}} Workspace a spustite import údajov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "датотеку за резервну копију" is a bit verbose and could be simplified. A more natural Serbian translation would use a shorter phrasing for "backup file".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изаберите {{organizationName}} Workspace датотеку резервне копије или Изаберите {{organizationName}} Workspace резервну датотеку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the use of 'ће' can sometimes sound overly formal. Depending on the overall tone, it might be preferable to use a more colloquial alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изаберите {{organizationName}} Workspace датотеку резервне копије како бисте започели увоз података. Након завршетка отпремања и анализе података, следећи корак ће се аутоматски покренути. (Alternative: Након што се заврши отпремање и анализа података, следећи корак ће се аутоматски покренути.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "datoteku za rezervnu kopiju" (file for backup) is slightly awkward. It would be more natural to say "datoteku za arhivu" (archive file) or simply "arhivu" (archive).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izaberite {{organizationName}} Workspace arhivu kako biste započeli uvoz podataka.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "sledeći korak će se automatski pokrenuti" is a bit literal. A more natural translation would use a verb that implies progression or continuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nakon što se završi otpremanje i analiza podataka, automatski će se preći na sledeći korak.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation "Виберіть файли резервної копії {{organizationName}} Workspace" is slightly awkward. 'Файли' (files) is redundant because 'резервної копії' already implies files. A more natural translation would be 'Виберіть файл резервної копії {{organizationName}} Workspace' or 'Виберіть файли для резервної копії {{organizationName}} Workspace'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Виберіть файл резервної копії {{organizationName}} Workspace

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Можна вибрати декілька файлів" (You can select several files) isn't explicitly stated in the English content. While it's a reasonable addition for user clarity, it's technically missing information from the original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing if strict adherence to the original is required. Otherwise, retain as it improves clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "系统会自动启动下一步" is a somewhat literal translation of "the next step will be initiated automatically." It lacks the natural flow of a user-facing message in Chinese. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the process continuing seamlessly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 数据上传和分析完成后，流程将自动进入下一步。
